info.title: about
info.description: Hi there! I'm a college student at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute studying computer science to be a software engineer. Throughout my coding journey, I've learned programming languages ranging from Java to C++ to Typescript and participated in various open source projects. When I'm not writing code or sleeping, I would most likely be listening to music or dancing.

subsections.title: VZCode
subsections.description: VZCode is a multiplayer code editing tool that supports real-time collaboration. Our goal was to improve the user experience with additional capabilities so that the platform could function as an alternative to VSCode. I focused on boosting remote user presence by implementing unique colors and tracking for user cursors, and selection, as well as displaying usernames.

subsections.title: YACS â€“ Yet Another Course Scheduler
subsections.description: YACS is an open-source web application that allows students to view course options, track dates of final exams, and calculate their GPA. Working with a group of ten, I implemented the option of displaying times in various formats and debugged user-submitted issues.
